OWN HARDWARE AND INFRASTRUCTURE

When you rent a vps or dedicated server from us, you're getting direct access to our in-house hardware and network infrastructure — no middlemen, no extra fees. We don’t resell from third parties. Everything is owned and operated by us, which means faster support, better performance, and more competitive pricing compared to most local hosting providers.

WHY CHOOSE US?

Over 500 satisfied customers trust us to host their projects — and we deliver with performance, reliability, and expert support.

365-24/7 SUPPORT
∞ ALWAYS ONLINE

Technical department is always ready 🟢 Write us or just call for urgent questions: +373 78232141.

SAME-DAY SETUP
NO DELAYS

Get root access quickly — even with custom configurations. Most servers are ready 🕚 in under 24 hours.

18 YEARS EXPERIENCE
IN IT INDUSTRY

Our employees play an important role in the QoS, observing the highest 🙏 ethical and technical standards.

GET STARTED WITH US TODAY

Launch any service on your VPS or dedicated server — from file storage, websites, and mail servers to CDN nodes or FTP backups. 😎 Whatever you need, we’ve got you covered.

Enjoy flexible monthly plans and a risk-free start with our money-back guarantee. Sign up free — no commitment! Register now for free!

BE IN GOOD COMPANY

With years of experience in VPS, dedicated servers, and cloud infrastructure, we've earned the confidence of startups, developers, and businesses worldwide. Join thousands of satisfied customers and host with a team you can truly rely on.
